mapper.select:
select
from enterprise_auth_device where device_id = #{deviceId} and channel_no = #{channelNo} and app_id = #{appId} order by id desc

select
from enterprise_auth_device where third_store_id = #{thirdStoreId} and app_id = #{appId} and auth_status = '1' and auth_end_time > now() order by id desc

select
from enterprise_auth_device where third_store_id = #{thirdStoreId} and app_id = #{appId} and auth_status = '1' and now() > auth_end_time order by id desc

select
from enterprise_auth_device where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} and device_id in
#{item}

select enterprise_id, count(distinct case when app_id = 'meituan' then concat(device_id, channel_no) end) as meituanAuthDeviceNum, count(distinct case when app_id = 'meituan' and auth_status = '1' and now() >= auth_start_time and auth_end_time >= now() then concat(device_id, channel_no) end) AS meituanCurrentlyAuthDeviceNum, count(distinct case when app_id = 'meituan' and auth_status = '1' and LAST_DAY(#{param.queryDate}) >= auth_start_time and auth_end_time >= #{param.queryDate} then concat(device_id, channel_no) end) as meituanMonthlyAuthorizedDeviceNum, count(distinct case when app_id = 'eleme' then concat(device_id, channel_no) end) as elemeAuthDeviceNum, count(distinct case when app_id = 'eleme' and auth_status = '1' and now() >= auth_start_time and auth_end_time >= now() then concat(device_id, channel_no) end) AS elemeCurrentlyAuthDeviceNum, count(distinct case when app_id = 'eleme' and auth_status = '1' and LAST_DAY(#{param.queryDate}) >= auth_start_time and auth_end_time >= #{param.queryDate} then concat(device_id, channel_no) end) as elemeMonthlyAuthorizedDeviceNum from enterprise_auth_device where enterprise_id != 'a7e798ac2103400c8dbe92ebe2f67cee'
and enterprise_id in
#{item}
group by enterprise_id order by enterprise_id

select enterprise_id, sum(case when app_id = 'meituan' then 1 else 0 end) as meituanMonthlyCallNum, sum(case when app_id = 'eleme' then 1 else 0 end) as elemeMonthlyCallNum from enterprise_device_fetch_stream_log
enterprise_id in
#{item}
and create_time >= #{queryDate} and LAST_DAY(#{queryDate}) >= create_time
group by enterprise_id
